snippet: Consulting companies like Activate Networks use social network diagrams to help pharmaceutical marketers identify prescribing histories and relationships among doctors.
lead_paragraph: Consulting companies like Activate Networks use social network diagrams to help pharmaceutical marketers identify prescribing histories and relationships among doctors.

headline.seo: Drug Marketers Use Social Network Diagrams to Help Locate Influential Doctors
